title: Ticket #3531: Eliminate unnecessary proxy refreshes for grid-type batch jobs
description:
For grid-type batch jobs, the gridmanager attempts refreshing the proxy in a couple cases where it's not necessary.

The ft-gahp doesn't support forwarding a refreshing proxy. So when the blahp (and ft-gahp) are running on a remote machine via ssh, don't bother trying to refresh the proxy in the blahp.

For other grid-types, we save the expiration time of the delegated proxy in the job ad so that on restart, we don't redelegate the proxy if the local one hasn't changed. We should do the same for batch jobs.
